ing: 1 cup sweet and smoky-style barbeque sauce (such as Sweet Baby Ray'sÂ® Hickory & Brown Sugar)
des: "I was looking for something simple and different with a citrus touch and stumbled onto this quick BBQ sauce, especially for chicken. I use this all summer. It's good on beef, too, but best on chicken."
ins: Stir barbeque sauce, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, and oil together in a bowl until smooth.
